gameDetails.name: Sheriff of Nottingham: Gen Con 2014 Promo Set
gameDetails.description:
This promo pack contains six new cards for Sheriff of Nottingham:


     Brimstone Oil
         Collect gold at the end of the game or discard immediately to destroy an opponent's pair of legal goods.
    
     Olive Oil
     Strawberry Mead
         Increases the value of all other mead you manage to smuggle past the sheriff
    
     Golden Silk
         Increases the value of all other silk you manage to smuggle past the sheriff
    
     Dragon Pepper
         Increases the value of all other pepper you manage to smuggle past the sheriff
    
     Heavy Crossbow
         Increases the value of all other crossbows you manage to smuggle past the sheriff
